gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 124, Bulls 113
gameRecap.excerpt: Boston defeats Chicago, 124-113. For Boston, Jayson Tatum led the way with 26 points and six assists while aided by Sam Hauser (23 points, five rebounds, seven 3PM) and Al Horford (23 points, eight rebounds) in the win. DeMar DeRozan finished with 28 points, six rebounds, and nine assists with Ayo Dosunmu adding 14 points, four assists, and two steals for Chicago in the losing effort. Boston wins and improves to 57-14, while Chicago moves to 34-37 in the loss.
